faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Syllabus Buddy
faq.how_to_upload: How do I upload a syllabus?
faq.how_to_upload_answer: To upload a syllabus, go to the home screen and tap the '+' button. Select your syllabus file (PDF or image) and follow the prompts to complete the upload.
faq.supported_formats_answer: We currently support PDF files and images (JPEG, PNG, GIF). Make sure your file is clear and readable for best results.
faq.processing_time: How long does it take to process a syllabus?
faq.processing_time_answer: Processing time varies depending on the file size and complexity. Most syllabi are processed within 1-2 minutes. You can track the progress in real-time.
faq.edit_syllabus: Can I edit my syllabus after uploading?
faq.edit_syllabus_answer: Yes, you can edit your syllabus at any time. Go to the syllabus details page and tap the edit button to make changes to topics, dates, or other information.
faq.delete_syllabus: How do I delete a syllabus?
faq.delete_syllabus_answer: To delete a syllabus, go to the syllabus details page, tap the menu button (three dots), and select 'Delete'. Confirm your choice to permanently remove the syllabus.
faq.privacy_answer: Yes, your syllabus data is completely private. We use secure encryption and never share your data with third parties. You can read our privacy policy for more details.

tutorial.title: How to Use Syllabus Buddy
tutorial.subtitle: Learn how to make the most of your syllabus

step1.title: Upload Your Syllabus
step1.description: Start by uploading your syllabus file. We support PDF and image formats. Make sure your file is clear and readable.

step2.title: Review and Edit
step2.description: After processing, review the extracted information. You can edit topics, dates, and other details to ensure accuracy.

step3.title: Track Progress
step3.description: Monitor your progress through the syllabus. Mark topics as completed and get reminders for upcoming deadlines.

step4.title: Generate Quizzes
step4.description: Create quizzes from your syllabus content to test your knowledge and prepare for exams.

tips.title: Pro Tips
tips.tip1: Use clear, high-quality images for best results
tips.tip2: Regularly update your progress to stay on track
tips.tip3: Enable notifications to never miss a deadline
